item.description: Stephen Anthony's in the Wayside Country Store Plaza on the Sudbury-Marlboro line has wonderful food. Let's meet for breakfast and good conversation on the 1st. day of Aug. The plaza has a great candy store a yummy bakery and the country store. It is located on a pond with lots of geese and ducks. I will bring corn so we can feed them too. Nice area and the food.... 5 stars! Let's go!

group.name: WEST OF BOSTON OVER 40 GAY WOMENS MEET-UP

item.name: Let's do Breakfast
